title: Enna Vilai Azhagae Song Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam
stanzas:
Enna Vilai Azhagae Song Lyrics Kadhalar Dinam
#ARRahman #UnniMenon #Vaali 

Enna vilai azhagae
Enna vilai azhagae
sonna vilaikku vaanga varuven
vilai uyir endraalum tharuven
indha azhagai kandu
viyandhu pogiren

oru mozhi illaamal 
mounam aagiren(2)

Enna vilai azhagae
sonna vilaikku vaanga varuven
vilai uyir endraalum tharuven
indha azhagai kandu
viyandhu pogiren

oru mozhi illaamal 
oru mozhi illaamal 
mounam aagiren (2)

Padaithaan iraivan unaiye
malaithaan udane avane
azhagai padaikkum 
thiramai mulukka
unnudan saarndhadhu
en vizhi serndhadhu

vidiya vidya madiyil
kidakkum 
pon veenai un meni
meettatum en meni

viraivinil vandhu kalandhidu
viral pada mella kanindhidu
udal mattum ingu kidakkudhu
udan vandhu neeyum uyir kodu

pallavan sirpigal andru
panniya sirppathil ondru
pennena vandhadhu indru
silaiye... (2)
undhan azhagukillai eedu.

Enna vilai azhagae
sonna vilaikku vaanga varuven
vilai uyir endraalum tharuven
indha azhagai kandu
viyandhu pogiren

oru mozhi illaamal 
oru mozhi illaamal 
mounam aagiren

Uyire unaiye ninaindhu
vizhi neer mazhaiyil nenaindhu

imaiyil irukkum iravu urakkam
kanvitu poyaachu 
karanam neeyaachu
unavu erikka
ninaivu kodhikka
aaraadha nenjaachu
aahaaram nanjaachu

dhinam dhinam unnai ninaikiren
thurumbena udal ilaikiren
uyir kondu varum padhumaiye
unnai vida illai pudhumaiye.

un pugal vaiyamum solla
sitrena vaasallil mella
chithiram vetkudhu mella
uyire... (2)
unnai naanum serum naalthaan

Enna vilai azhagae
Enna vilai azhagae
sonna vilaikku vaanga varuven
vilai uyir endraalum tharuven
indha azhagai kandu
viyandhu pogiren

oru mozhi illaamal 
oru mozhi illaamal 
mounam aagiren (3)
